* GPicSync RPM packages:*

Marc Christensen have created RPM packages for many Linux distributions. More informations for can be found here [RpmPackages here].

If you're on Linux you can have the latest version by doing a SVN checkout in a shell:

{{{svn checkout http://gpicsync.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ gpicsync}}}

Then read the README file to check for dependencies.
